Sentencas: Direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell (DC-SOFC) is a novel and efficient power generation device which utilizes solid carbon through electrochemical oxidation.
Titulo: A novel biomass modified brown coal as composite fuel for high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thereinto, clean and highly efficient utilization of coal is an important way to realize the dual carbon strategic goals.
Titulo: A novel biomass modified brown coal as composite fuel for high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Nevertheless, the DC-SOFC performances with coal fuel are commonly low due to the certain amounts of inherent impurities of ashes and volatilizations.
Titulo: A novel biomass modified brown coal as composite fuel for high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Taking this into account, a novel composite coal-based fuel is ingeniously designed as fuel for DC-SOFCs, in which the brown coal char is modified by adding a small proportion of kelp biomass carbon.
Titulo: A novel biomass modified brown coal as composite fuel for high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With the configuration of AgCe0.9Gd0.1O2-delta/YSZ/Ag-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta symmetrical cell structure, the maximum power density of the cell with the novel composite fuel can reach 299 mW cm-2 at 850 celcius, which is outstandingly promoted compared to the cell with pure brown coal char (242 mW cm ï¿½ 2).
Titulo: A novel biomass modified brown coal as composite fuel for high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Likewise, the composite fuel fed DC-SOFC presents a prolonged discharge stability than the kelp biochar fueled cell.
Titulo: A novel biomass modified brown coal as composite fuel for high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study introduces a novel concept of composite fuel for DC-SOFCs, which offers a new way for the development of high-performance direct brown coal fuel cells or direct carbon fuel cells with other coal fuel with the feature of highly efficient and clean use of coal for power generation.
Titulo: A novel biomass modified brown coal as composite fuel for high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells
